thread.title: Trump Invites Up Very Enthusiastic Supporter to Speak at Rally
thread.title_full: Trump Invites Up Very Enthusiastic Supporter to Speak at Rally

author: Josh Feldman
title: Trump Invites Up Very Enthusiastic Supporter to Speak at Rally
text:
Trump Invites Up Very Enthusiastic Supporter to Speak at Rally by Josh Feldman | 6:19 pm, February 18th, 2017 
President Trump took a moment during his Florida rally to invite a very excited supporter onto the stage to let him speak. 
Trump said he saw the man while watching TV coverage earlier that morning. This particular Trump supporter was apparently waiting outside the rally venue since 4 am. 
You can watch the moment above, via CNN. 
[ image via screengrab ]
